name: guardian-of-alola
effect: Inflicts direct damage equal to ¾ of the target’s remaining HP.
short_effect: Damages the target for 75% of its remaining HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
